the-daily.title: The Daily
the-daily.description: The way daily news should sound. The most important subjects you need to know.

mbmbm.title: My Brother, My Brother, and Me
mbmbm.description: Three comedic brothers, too many strange questions, endless funnies.

reply-all.title: Reply All
reply-all.description: A podcast about the internet that is actually an unfailingly original exploration of modern life and how to survive it.

this-american-life.title: This American Life
this-american-life.description: This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations.

mission-to-zyx.title: Mission to Zyx
mission-to-zyx.description: TMISSION TO ZYXX is an improvised science fiction podcast following a team of ambassadors as they attempt to establish diplomatic relations with planets in the remote and chaotic ZYXX QUADRANT
